features: ULTRALIGHT FORMULA — ‘Shake before use’ technology allows lotion to be ultralight yet highly effective moisturizing skin
REPLENISH DRY SKIN — Hydrate everyday dry skin, maintain skin’s natural moisture balance, supplement natural oils
ABSORBS QUICKLY AND MOISTURIZES INSTANTLY — Non-greasy ultralight fluid lotion that spread easily, absorb quickly and leaves a smooth after feel
VEGAN AND CRUELTY FREE — Vegan, cruelty free, non-comedogenic, and 100% recyclable
PREMIUM INGREDIENTS — Powerful oils, vitamins, and antioxidant hydrate skin such as Shea Oil, Rosehip Oil, Jojoba Seed Oil
body.description: Bio-Oil Body Lotion pioneers a new level of lightness and efficacy in body moisturization. The product is significantly thinner than the majority of currently available body lotions and has on average 2X the amount of oil. Our high-oil formula is infused with Shea Oil, Rosehip Oil, Jojoba Seed Oil, Hyaluronic Acid, and Vitamins E & A. This unique combination of being ultralight yet high in oil is made possible by Bio-Oil’s pioneering ‘shake before use’ formulation. Bio-Oil Body Lotion has been formulated to hydrate and replenish mild everyday dry skin, helping to maintain the skin’s natural moisture balance. It supplements the skin’s natural oils which can be stripped away by factors such as extreme weather, water with high chemical content, frequent bathing and the drying effects of central heating and air conditioning. It helps lock in moisture and reduces the rate at which water vapour is naturally lost through the skin’s surface. This product is non-comedogenic, safe for oily skin, acne prone skin, and sensitive skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultralight, High-Oil Formulation Bio-Oil Body Lotion pioneers a new level of lightness and efficacy in body moisturization with twice the amount of oil as most currently available body lotions. This unique formula that's high in oil yet ultralight is made possible by Bio-Oil's pioneering 'shake before use' technology. Absorbs Quickly and Moisturizes Instantly Bio-Oil Body Lotion's high-oil formulation is delivered in a non-greasy ultralight fluid lotion that is able to deliver an ultra-satisfying, deep moisturization. Leaves Your Skin Feeling Silky Soft and Smooth Bio-Oil Body Lotion spreads easily, absorbs quickly and leaves a silky, soft and smooth after feel on the skin.

Ultralight, High-Oil Formulation Bio-Oil Body Lotion pioneers a new level of lightness and efficacy in body moisturization with twice the amount of oil as most currently available body lotions. This unique formula that's high in oil yet ultralight is made possible by Bio-Oil's pioneering 'shake before use' technology. Step 2 Massage in a circular motion until almost fully absorbed. Bio-Oil Body Lotion can be used all over the body and is gentle enough to be used on sensitive, oily, and acne-prone skin. Step 3 Apply two times daily or whenever your skin feels dry for best results!

Skincare Oil Body Lotion Dry Skin Gel Natural Skincare Oil Why You'll Love It Helps reduce the appearance of stretch marks, scars, and other marks due to surgery, injury, acne, aging, pregnancy, and more. Significantly thinner than the majority of currently available body lotions and has 2X the amount of oil on average, leaving skin feeling silky smooth to the touch with no greasy residue. Made with a unique, gelled oil formula that targets the top layer of skin to restore moisture and heal dry, cracked, or flaking skin. It's also non-comedogenic meaning it won't clog pores! Helps reduce the appearance of stretch marks, scars and other marks due to surgery, injury, acne, aging, pregnancy and more using its 100% natural formula with no added fragrance or dyes Skin Types All All All All Dermatologist Recommended Yes No No Yes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So moisturizing and soothing
reviews.reviewText: I have been very dehydrated lately and my skin was very dry to the point of itching after every shower and having patches of visible dry flaky skin. I was basically looking for anything that was in my price range and could get here soon because I was tired of itching and feeling this tight dry skin all the time. I bought this product and as soon as it went on my skin I literally felt like my skin was saying thank you for all this nourishment and all this moisture. My skin felt amazing and now that I've been using it for four or five days my skin has no more dry patchiness it stopped itching and it feels really nice now and smooth and soft. I would highly recommend to anyone with dry skin. It is unscented so that makes it very non-gender specific so if you're a woman or a man you can buy this and put this on without feeling like oh I'm going to smell floral or I'm going to smell musky. But honestly I would definitely give this a try for anyone who's having dry skin problems because it's really nice it goes on very nice it doesn't feel sticky or goopy because it dries really quickly and it's so nice and I have itchy flaky skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly Moisturizing & Absorbent
reviews.reviewText: This lotion very moisturizing and absorbs completely in the skin. It’s hydrating and has zero smell. The texture is not a thick cream like traditional lotions, but more of a loose, watery lotion. It’s a milk white color. Isn’t oily but feels like a silky, watery lotion that immediately absorbs into the skin. Great product for wintertime or for anyone with dry skin in general. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the lotion, hate the bottle
reviews.reviewText: Writing this review on my husband’s account. This lotion was great for itchy skin during pregnancy. It worked better than prescription topicals from my doctor. A little goes a long way. It’s a thin oil like consistency but doesn’t leave your skin greasy and the moisture lasts all through the day. It’s unscented which is a bonus and my sensitive skin is very happy.I love this lotion, hate the bottle/packaging. It doesn’t come with plastic wrap or a safety seal; there’s a risk that the bottle could leak during transit or someone could tamper with it without you knowing. Also, because this lotion is so runny, it’s impossible to pour it in your hands without residual product running down the side of the bottle after. I wipe the bottle down each use but also store it in a separate tub so it doesn’t damage my cabinet. I plan to get a pump bottle instead to prevent this for future orders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lotion vs Oil
reviews.reviewText: I use Bio-oil and love everything about the product, so I decided to try the lotion. Yes, at first I thought it was too watery, and it didn't look or smell anything like the oil. But, please know that this is a genuine product, and not watered down nor fake, like some disappointed people here have sorely reviewed!! This is a lotion, and the oil is an oil...simply two completely different products made by the same company. So, as far as Bio-lotion is concerned, and apart from juding it against Bio-oil, I do like the way it goes on my skin, it definitely works well, and it has a clean smell, meaning no scent at all. I actually think this is a great lotion to use when you don't want greasy residue on your clothes...and especially if you are scent-sensitive, or maybe you just want to smell like yourself and not a walking lavender bush:)lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: like others, I was skeptical because of the very liquidity consistency (photo 1) but I love that it seems to really sink into my skin quick, doesn't take forever to lather on like thick lotions especially on dry skin, and leaves a nice hydrated look (photo 2). the arm photos are foe this review using just the bio oil but I've found I really love using it right after the shower on almost dry skin, followed by cerave cream. also this listing has 'rose' and 'Shea butter' not sure what's up w that but I bought the one labeled Shea butter however it is thankfully NOT scented and smells like nothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super Grease, pure oil - not for me
reviews.reviewText: Apparently it's a very watery lotion, which made me excited because of the “it should dry quickly” aspect, but no, the “water” is pure oil. It's like you're putting on body oil. It leaves your skin super oily, takes a LONG time to dry, if at all, I think doesn't just come off when you put on clothes. After it had “absorbed”, I made a mark on the skin to see if the skin was still dry, and to my surprise the skin was completely dry. It doesn't have any smell. But if you are looking for a body oil, better go with the original version of their oil which dries faster and smells good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE! So glad I ordered! ❤️❤️❤️
reviews.reviewText: I’m an expecting mom who was on the search for a good & moisturizing lotion to keep my skin happy and healthy. I read tons of reviews prior to ordering, which kind of had me on the fence about purchasing but I’m SO GLAD I decided to anyway! This is my favorite moisturizer!Pros-A little goes a long way! It comes out in an oily/milky-like content that spreads very easily. It has hardly little to no scent, but it’s still very refreshing. My skin feels like it’s glowing since I’ve used this. I also do not feel like it immediately transfers to my clothing once applying, nor is it sticky at all.Cons-The bottle.I read many, many people talking about this before I ordered so here’s my opinion:Yes, it could have a better dispenser but it’s not a make or break deal. I simply put my hand close to where I dispense, and just catch any extra product that may leak out (this hardly ever happens & even when it did — it was little to none).I honestly have no other cons whatsoever — I love this!I would not put this on my face. I know it says body, but I still read some people talking about applying to their face. It is an oily product so I personally believe it would break your face out if you have sensitive skin like myself.Hope this helps anyone looking for a great moisturizer! 🎉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light but powerful
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I’ve been looking for. This is liquid with a nice oil base that moisturizes well with no scent. A little goes a long way.

I'm a fan of Bio Oil, so I thought I would try this out too. I read a review where thry suggested putting it in a spray bottle to use. This is a great tip! It is pretty fluid and when I poured into my hands it would run through my fingers. The spray bottle is perfect for no waste! Also! There is no scent which was nice too.
I have been buying this for a bit now. It makes my skin so smooth and has no smell as well which I like.
I would say the lotion is way too watery for a lotion. Other than that, I guess it’s good
